title: Miles Davis - We Want Miles (1982) Extented (2009) 2CD
description:
Ã¢â‚¬Å“We Want MilesÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½, released in 1982, Miles Davis's second recording since ending his six-year retirement was one of his best of the 1980s. Unlike his bands from the 1970s, this particular unit leaves plenty of space and plays much more melodically. Guitarist Mike Stern lets loose some fury, but electric bassist Marcus Miller is not reluctant to walk now and then in a straight-ahead fashion, drummer Al Foster and percussionist Mino Cinelu are tasteful, and Bill Evans gets in a few good spots on soprano. 
As for Miles, he was gradually regaining his earlier form.
